title: Introducing: keii
content:
In a year when P C Music has made a pop star of an energy drink and churned out auto-tuned hit after hit, there’s really no saying where pop meets cheesy anymore.

Sixteen year old keii (pronounced kay) purposefully leaves his identity as ambiguous, with a Tumblr chock-a-block with colourful, apparently unassociated images, and his Soundcloud only featuring an absolute bonkers remix of Childish Gambino’s Sweatpants, a seemingly Skrillex inspired mash-up, and his recent ‘single, relapse / fracture. Everything about his music is energetic, brash, vibrant, off the wall and ultimately completely batshit insane, yet deliriously brilliant. I can’t even begin to work out where the samples are lifted from, and perhaps for the best, perhaps it would remove some of the magic. Check out fracture, relapse and his Childish Gambino remix below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
